languages.text: At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, all enemies suffering from any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effects inflicted by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} have their incoming damage-over-time from any source increased by +20%. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: At the start of each round, all enemies under a DoT effect applied by Executioner, receive a stacking 20% incoming damage bonus for all DoT effects.

At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, all enemies under any damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} applied by the Executioner have their incoming damage-over-time from any source increased by a stacking +20% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.

At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, all enemies under any damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} applied by the Executioner have their incoming damage-over-time from any source increased by a stacking +20% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.

At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, all enemies suffering from any damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} inflicted by the Executioner have their incoming damage-over-time from any source increased by +20%. Stacks.

At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, all enemies suffering from any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effects inflicted by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} have their incoming damage-over-time from any source increased by +20%. Stacks.

At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, all enemies suffering from any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effects inflicted by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} have their incoming damage-over-time from any source increased by +20%. Stacks.

languages.text: Al comienzo de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, todos los enemigos que sufran de cualquier efecto de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} continuado infligido por el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} reciben +20 % de daño continuado adicional, provenga de donde provenga. Es acumulativo.

languages.text: 各{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}開始時、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}から与えられた何らかの継続{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}効果を受けているすべての敵は、あらゆるソースから受ける継続ダメージが+20%増加する。この効果はスタックする。

languages.text: 每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}开始时，所有由于{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}的持续伤害效果而受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}的敌人，后续受到的所有持续伤害都会提高20%。此效果可叠加。

languages.text: Her {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raundun{/g} başlangıcında {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Cellat{/g}'ın sebep olduğu zamanla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} veren etkilerden muzdarip olan tüm düşmanlara her türlü kaynaktan gelen zamanla hasar +%20 artar. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
